p: The drop in 27OHC serum concentration appeared to be a specific event, since 24OHC was slightly reduced only in moderate (P = 0.036) and severe (P = 0.029) COVID-19 cases, while 25OHC exhibited a small but significant decline only in severe patients (P = 0.018) and it was even slightly increased in the PACP group (P = 0.033 compared to controls, P < 0.001 compared to severe COVID-19 patients), possibly as a consequence of a transiently beneficial INFγ-mediated induction of cholesterol-25-hydroxylase ( Fig. 5) [ 6, 50].
